name: LeExterminator
description:
My car was stolen on Dec. 18th 2020, so I made a game to raise money for a new one. Your an exterminator hired to get ride of the insects that have taken hold of your clients house. 

Hand drawn 2.5D shooter  that sees you dungeon crawling through an ant hill.

  • 3 Bosses
  • 4 different Weapons
  • 6 unique enemy Types

Game is roughly 1-2 hrs long, maybe longer if your not that good at games.

Controls: 

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to dodge
  • LMB to Attack
  • 1234 or Scroll Wheel to swap weapons

Games free but your support would be much appreciated.
